Package hr.fer.oop.lab3

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClubTeam
    This class is derived from the Team class and represents a Club Team with the name of the team, its formation and reputation points.
    Coach
    This class represents football coaches, with their name, country and emotion level inherited from the Person class, with the addition of coaching skill and it's favorite formation.
    FootballPlayer
    This class represents football players, with their name, country and emotion level inherited from the Person class, with the addition of Football Player's playing skill and his natural playing position.
    NationalTeam
    This class represents football national teams, with the name of the team, its formation and country name.
    Person
    This class represents individual persons, with their name, representing country and emotion level within the range of [0, 100].
    SimpleFootballPlayerCollectionImpl
    This class represents a collection of Football Players.
    Team
    This class represents football teams, with the name of the team and its formation.
